titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of funds by Internal Revenue Service to target citizens of the United States for exercising any right guaranteed under the First Amendment to the Constitution of the United States.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: 4/15/2015--Introduced. Prohibits the use of any funds by the Internal Revenue Service to target citizens for exercising any right guaranteed under the First Amendment to the Constitution.
